task.title: Creating a DITA Concept
task.shortdesc: This section walks you through the steps on how to create a DITA concept.

taskbody.prereq: In order to write about a DITA concept about a product or task, you must have knowledge about your product or a task.

step.cmd: Right click on the Topic Head>Append child>New.
Type in task and select the template for DITA/Task.
Navigate to the folder where you want to keep all the DITA files.

taskbody.result: As a result of the steps given above you will be able to create a DITA concept under the DITA Maps Manager.
